meanings.definition: Existing or occurring between different species.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had an interspecific exhibit with both lions and zebras.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the interspecific relationships between bees and flowers.
meanings.sent3: It was an interspecific party with dogs, cats, and even a parrot!
meanings.sent4: The forest was a bustling interspecific marketplace of animal interactions.
meanings.sent5: The interspecific harmony of the coral reef was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving interactions between different species.
meanings.sent1: The interspecific competition for food was fierce in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The park ranger explained the importance of interspecific cooperation in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The interspecific soccer match between ants and beetles was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The interspecific dance of the fireflies lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The interspecific communication between dolphins and whales is fascinating to observe.
